title: Moto G6 Review: Budget Champion | Trusted Reviews
description: * [Awards 2018 - Reviews]()It isn’t the brightest screen around; you’ll want either to enable auto-brightness or manually jack it up in the settings panel to improve outdoorvisibility. Viewing angles are surprisingly good, however.Another slight niggle is that by default the screen is a little on the coolside: whites take on a slight blue hue; it just feels a little cold. However,whether or not this is an issue is a matter of personal preference, ratherthan there being something _wrong_ with the display. If it annoys, I’drecommend you head into settings for a tweak.[ Next  Performance and Software](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/moto-g6-performance-and-software)
